sentences.en: Awa can just move unwieldy overweight small noodle boy.
sentences.cn: 可阿波只是个体重超重动作笨拙的小面馆小伙计.

sentences.en: Dad: Oh, happy day! My son finally having the noodle dream!
sentences.cn: 爸爸: 哦, 快乐的一天! 我的儿子终于做了面条的梦!

sentences.en: Get some noodle for me when you go shopping.
sentences.cn: 你上街买东西时替我买一些面条.

sentences.en: In their place: Salads, brown fish and chicken noodle soup.
sentences.cn: 他现在只“享用”沙拉 、 糙米和鸡肉汤面.

sentences.en: No wonder his noodle broth tasted lide chicden stock!
sentences.cn: 他的面肉汤喝起来都像是鸡汤了!

sentences.en: Now, listen! Rice, noodle, porridge, water and tea.
sentences.cn: 听着! 米饭 、 面条 、 粥 、 水和茶.

sentences.en: Please put more minced meat into my noodle soup.
sentences.cn: 请给我的面条里多加些肉末.

sentences.en: Pour away boiling water, Put noodle into soup and serve immediately.
sentences.cn: 将煮面用过的滚水倒掉,夹起面条, 放进已准备好的汤内.

sentences.en: Serve the meat with rice or noodles.
sentences.cn: 肉配米饭或面条一起上。

sentences.en: The micro _ amounts of Arsenic are detected in drink candy and instant noodle.
sentences.cn: 以饮料、糖果、方便面为样品,测定了其中微量总砷的含量.

sentences.en: The relation of wheat and noodle quality was studied.
sentences.cn: 以普通机制面条为对象,研究了小麦品质指标对面条品质的影响.

sentences.en: There is a lot of oil floating in the noodle soup.
They have two restaurants that purvey dumplings and chicken noodle soup.
sentences.cn: 他们那里有两家供应饺子和鸡肉汤面的餐馆。

sentences.en: Today we have chicken noodle, tomato and clam chowder.
sentences.cn: 女招待:今天有鸡面 、 蕃茄、杂烩汤.

sentences.en: Use your noodle to figure out the math problem.
sentences.cn: 动动脑子,把这道数学题做出来.

sentences.en: Would you like chowder or chicken noodle?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢杂脍,还是鸡肉面汤?

trans.tran_en: a long thin piece of food made from a mixture of flour, water, and eggs, usually cooked in soup or boiling water
